tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I am not  the one usually write reviews. But this time I thought I should really do it because this would really help someone.we were married for 5 years and planned to have baby after 2 years of marriage.we both are really good health and usually we have very healthy lifestyle. we do practice yoga stress free life. inspite of all this we struggled to conceive for 3 years with no valid medical reasons.
Someone from our friends circle suggested us to meet Sumana mam. when we met her she examined all our reports and suggested to go for IUI. we tried it, it didnt work then we  took a break for 6 months and then decided to go for IVF. And its the success in 2 nd attempt.
we are blessed with baby boy  4 month back. we are really thankful to Sumana mam.she suggested/guided us to make right decision.She is the best one to consult if you are waiting for joy to coming in your life.
I am really happy with the nurses and caring staff service.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
We wanted to plan baby as we got married late in age of 35. but within 1 year of marriage we understood that there is some complications with us. We were referred by our relative Gynecologist to Dr. Sumana. Dr. sumana she talked with very patiently and looked in our all reports. She explained the problem and how to medically deal with it. 
We followed her all the suggestions and the result was successful. We got success in 1st attempt of ICSI. Dr. Sumana looked in to my health till 1st trimester of pregnancy and help me out with all my initial complications.

****** *** ********* *** ******* ****** *** *********** ******* ** ****** She understand the patient need very well and advise accordingly.
She is very much dedicated to her patient and put her all efforts to make 100% success in her attempt. I liked the way she have treated me and satisfied with it. We got the right person at the beginning and things went smooth for us with Dr. Sumana. There is no words to explain how much happy we are now.  We are very much thankful of Dr sumana for helping in bringing happiness in our life.
Thank you so much Dr. Sumana.

I rate 5/5 and 100% recommend to all the couples who are facing complications.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review: Married for 6 years with unexplained infertility...i had 2 failed IUI and 1 failed IVF cycle in very well known fertility centre..We have a gap of an year and we were recommended by a friend to consult Dr Sumana..She took a lot of time and patience to understand our case and suggested few tests to rule out if there could be any known reason for the fertility issues..Post which we underwent a IVF cycle and i conceived in the first attempt..My pregnancy was great and i am now a mother of a baby girl who turned 5 months old...There isn't a day we don't thank Dr Sumana in our hearts ..She gave us the biggest gift of our lives.... Parenthood...Thank you Sumana Ma'am...we truly admire your knowledge, experience and you are a very genuine person and we respect you immensely.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: ** ****** ** *** ** *** **** ******* * **** **** **** She listens to what we have to say very patiently, she explains things very thoroughly. Patience and organisation skills are the best qualities of Dr Sumana. She puts efforts to make things possible and consider every patient's issues very personally and provide the treatment. She doesn't sugar coat the things, speaks very straightforward. I totally recommend Dr Sumana for anyone who is facing fertility issues and looking for solutions. Dr Sumana and her team (at Cloudnine Malleswaram) is the best team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Value for money,
review: Dctr doesn't have patience to listen our concerns.. she reads our old reports and if we try to talk she ll stare at us and doesn't let us talk comfortably.. she is not friendly... It was a one side communication meeting her..

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: Dr sumana gurunath is a very calm and cool doctor.explaining of the health issu is also very good.she is very friendly .definitely i would recommend her.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
context: Fertilisation In Vitro - Embryo Transfer (IVF - ET),Pregnancy Check Up,Pregnancy Tests,
review:
We have ben consulting the Doctor Sumana Gurunath since Feb2020 for IVF treatment. *** *** ********* *** ************ ***** Prior to this, we consulted so many doctors for the infertility and almost lost hope that we may not become parents. 

Finally with one our relatives advise & recommendation, we met the Doctor Sumana Gurunath at Cloud9 Hospital, Malleswaram, Bangalore. She's been treating us very nicely from the day one. And surprisingly my wife conceived and she's 4th month now with twin babies. Our entire family is so happy for this. Thanks a lot to a very well experienced Dr. Sumana Gurunath. 

Only thing is the pre & post treatment is pretty costly as far as my financial background is concerned. But then we are so happy. Thanks to Sumana Ma'am and Cloud9 team.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
After 3 failed IUI, had done IVF(FET),   Today I have conceived. I am 6 month pregnant.Dr Sumana is very calm and explained the treatment in detail and gave realistic success rate. She gave me confidence and helped me to stay positive during the treatment.
Would highly recommend her.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Doctor friendliness,

review: *** ****** ******** ** ** ********* ******* Very patient and explains everything very well. She treats her patients with utmost care and very particular about following the protocol. We highly recommend Dr. Sumana Gurunath. Thanks a lot ma'am for treating and considering our case.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Hi , I visited the doc for my  fertility issues..she is very practical and gets to the root cause of the problem. with her guidance and treatment I have concieved after 5 years . I cannot thank her enough.I would surely recommend Dr Sumana to all who is wanting and trying to conceive.I would like to thank Dr Sumana  for her help and wish her all the luck to help and  bring many more joy to this World.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
Motherhood is the biggest gamble in the world. It is the glorious life force. It's huge and scary — it's an act of infinite optimism. A baby is something you carry inside you for nine months, in your arms for three years and in your heart till the day you die.
And for me Dr.SUMANA GURUNATH has supported me a lot to cherish each and every moment during my pregnancy.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: We are very happy about treatment, explanation of health issues and suggestions given by doctor. The very first meeting gave us confidence in the doctor. Madam explain very clearly about the treatment, we are lucky to have Dr. Sumanna mam as our doctor

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Sumana was excellent in understanding the issue and the treatment provided. I would definitely recommend her. She was patient with all the queries I had every time and explained the issue and treatment in detail. She was never in a hurry to finish the appointment and very methodological in the treatment as well. She was very responsive in Whatsapp as well for any queries that I had.
*** ** ***** * ** ********* I had bad experience with cloudnine not one but twice , its not helpful at all. I won't recommend
